description:
Implement a ToolRegistry that automatically discovers and registers tools from a dedicated tools directory using introspection. Define a Tool interface with metadata (name, description, schema, required permissions) and enable runtime tool addition/removal without code changes.

**Rationale:** Tool usage is currently hard-coded in each agent's decision logic. A registry pattern would enable easier addition of new tools, better tool documentation generation, dynamic tool availability based on configuration, and simplified tool testing.
title: Create Pluggable Tool Registry with Dynamic Discovery
